website_summaries.verdict: A vegan, paraben-free formula for silky hair without offensive undertones.
pros: Keeps hair looking cool and silky
Use once per week for best results
Not as pricey as some other choices
cons: Some buyers don't like the fragrance or the fact that it doesn't get as sudsy as other types of shampoo

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: Works for me! I was going to get a drug store purple shampoo but since I normally use Biolage and they made one, I decided to get it. Don’t know yet if it dries out my hair like I’ve heard other shampoos do, and didn’t particularly notice the smell, but once I straightened my hair I could see a difference in the color... much less yellow and more ashy blonde.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good product!

My only complaint was that it somehow managed to turn my hair pink. Haha. Hopefully I can get this out sooner than later.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Staining tile and grout purple

I also think it stripped the extra color that was in my hair. My hair never looked so gray after just one use AND my hair felt like straw - I had to use 3x the conditioner to make it feel soft and normal again.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Usually use Finola, but when I saw the biolouge has a purple shampoo I was Excited. I love the scent of biolouge. I know it is expensive compared to things you can get at the drugstore, but was excited to see this purple shampoo. It smelled just like the normal shampoo, does not turn my hands purple, lathers up very nice, and has kept the tone in my hair. If I let my hair go longer between washes without using it, I do not think it would work like Finola does, but so far it’s been wonderful.

product_meta.title: BIOLAGE ColorLast Purple Shampoo | Neutralizes Brassy & Yellow Tones | Paraben-Free | For Color Treated Hair
product_meta.description:
Size:13.5 Fl OzMore than a purple shampoo, discover the combination of pure purple pigments with a blend of fig and orchid to keep your blonde healthy and conditioned until your next salon visit. ColorLast Purple is a toning shampoo that neutralizes brass and yellow tones by depositing & nbsp; purple pigment which brings back coolness to blonde hair leaving it looking healthy and fresh. ColorLast Purple leaves hair with a silky shine and 2.5X smoother with 3X less breakage. Vegan formula and paraben free vs non-conditioning shampoo with the system of Shampoo and Conditioner no animal-derived ingredients or by-products. What is purple shampoo and how does it work? Purple shampoo is purple colored shampoo that distributes purple pigment to neutralize brassy, yellow tones. Purple is used because, if you take a look at the color wheel, it is the direct opposite color of yellow. This means purple and yellow cancels one another out. So when using purple pigment on brassy, yellow tones it color corrects your hair's hue restoring it to its former bright, cooler color.

BRAND STORY
Professional By Nature. Honest By Choice. A recognized leader in professional haircare, BIOLAGE offers high-quality stylist-favorite products powered by botanicals.
